Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to penalties for a lodging facility that fails to comply with certain requirements for providing information concerning services for human trafficking victims
Summary: Provides that a lodging facility that fails to comply with certain requirements for providing information concerning services for human trafficking victims shall be liable for a civil penalty of five hundred dollars for a first offense and one thousand dollars for each subsequent offense; provides that the attorney general may bring an action or special proceeding in supreme court to recover civil penalties under certain circumstances.
LawCode: Amd ยง206-f, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to penalties for a lodging facility that fails to comply with certain requirements for providing information concerning services for human trafficking victims
